p: The novel coronavirus 2019 (2019-nCoV), formally named severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), is a novel human infectious coronavirus. COVID-19 is the disease caused by SARS-CoV-2. The disease was initially found in Wuhan at the end of 2019 and spread rapidly around the world. The number of infectious patients has increased worldwide, resulting in a pandemic situation. 1
